description: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
attrs: Bonus +3 Strength +6 Agility +3 Intelligence +6 Attack speed
info: For strength heroes, it grants 67.5 health, 0.38 health regen, 0.3% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 12 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.

For agility heroes, it grants 54 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 1.2 armor, 13.5 attack speed, 0.38% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 6 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 54 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 12 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 45 mana, 0.19 mana regen, 0.26% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
